org.springframework.kafka.support

类 LoggingProducerListener<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.support.ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
      • org.springframework.kafka.support.LoggingProducerListener<K,V>
  • 类型参数:
    K - the key type.
    V - the value type.
    所有已实现的接口:
    ProducerListener<K,V>

    public class LoggingProducerListener<K,V>
extends ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
    The ProducerListener that logs exceptions thrown when sending messages.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LoggingProducerListener

        public LoggingProducerListener()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setIncludeContents

        public void setIncludeContents(boolean includeContents)
        Whether the log message should include the contents (key and payload).
        参数:
        includeContents - true if the contents of the message should be logged

      • setMaxContentLogged

        public void setMaxContentLogged(int maxContentLogged)
        The maximum amount of data to be logged for either key or password. As message sizes may vary and become fairly large, this allows limiting the amount of data sent to logs.
        参数:
        maxContentLogged - the maximum amount of data being logged.

      • onError

        public void onError(java.lang.String topic,
                    java.lang.Integer partition,
                    K key,
                    V value,
                    java.lang.Exception exception)
        从接口复制的说明: ProducerListener
        Invoked after an attempt to send a message has failed.
        指定者:
        onError 在接口中 ProducerListener<K,V>
        覆盖:
        onError 在类中 ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
        参数:
        topic - the destination topic
        partition - the destination partition (could be null)
        key - the key of the outbound message
        value - the payload of the outbound message
        exception - the exception thrown
